problem_text_cn: 如图,这是圆桌正上方的灯泡(看作一个点)发出的光线照射到桌面后在地面上形成(圆形)的示意图．已知桌面直径为1.2米,桌面离地面1米．若灯泡离地面3米,则地面上阴影部分的面积为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, this is a schematic diagram of the light from the bulb (think as a point) directly above the round table forming a (circle) on the ground after shining on the table. It is known that the diameter of the table top is N_0, and the table top is N_1 above the ground. If the bulb is N_2 away from the ground, the area of ​​the shaded part on the ground is ()
raw_answer:
解:设阴影部分的直径是xm,则
1.2:x=2:3
解得x=1.8,
所以地面上阴影部分的面积为:S=πr^{2}=0.81πm^{2}．
